sentence: Governor Ron DeSantis recently gave a speech where he declared that "the student debt that is out there, almost 60% of it is graduate school debt."
author: Brad Slager
title: Fact-Checker's Own Website Proves DeSantis Accurate in 'Mostly False' Entry

sentence: Heilemann and Sorkin discuss the two enormous business stories dominating headlines: the stunning $44 billion acquisition of Twitter by SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk, whose roughly $275 billion net worth makes him the worlds richest person, and the Walt Disney Companys increasing embroilment in the culture wars, particularly as a whipping boy for Ron DeSantis, the Republican governor of Florida.
title: Andrew Ross Sorkin on the Biggest Stories in Business
